html:
4.2.24  12:38 pm   why did you make this site?

      because it was easier than emailing all the videos and things to everyone individually

4.2.24  11:53 am   i think i'm going to go to the store and buy a few snacks even though i told myself i wouldn't

      bizarre how malleable the future is, isn't it

4.2.24  11:30 am   Did you prank anyone yesterday

      indeed i pranked anyone who expected me to do a prank by of course not doing a prank

4.2.24  11:14 am   What's your favorite natural disaster 

      the big bang

4.2.24  10:50 am   do you prefer throwing oranges at doors over throwing apples at windows as passersby tend to do?

      i've never done anything like that

4.2.24  9:16 am   if you had to make everyone in the world listen to one song of yours, what would it be?

     in that case i'd have to compose something special for that situation

     what about a song by any artist?

     in that case also, i'd have to compose something special for the situation

4.2.24  4:46 am   I got a big class presentation tomorrow. To make it easier what should I imagine my class as?

      i'm not following this logic. but to make the presentation easier, what you gotta do is do 100 other presentations to other audiences first. the 101st one will be really easy and you'll be great at doing it

4.2.24  2:04 am   what are your thoughts on the quote "talking about music is like dancing about architechture"

      fair enough

4.2.24  1:04 am   would you ever run some footage through a vhs player for an effect (if you had the means)

      if i already had the means, sure, but i would not deliberately seek that out. there are plenty of other ways to make effects, including some less trendily trodden

4.1.24  11:01 pm   is there a particular shape you dislike?

      in some situations

4.1.24  10:55 pm   will the art eventually destroy the artist?

      that happens sometimes, but not every time

4.1.24  10:05 pm   why do slim chance and fat chance mean the same thing?

      this is due to sarcasm, which ultimately can be traced back to having a sense of humor. like when it's april 1st and you say something like "it's april 2nd haha" when it's really not. something of that sort

4.1.24  10:04 pm   What is your opinion on the fact that if you take what, where, and when and change the w's to t's, you get their answers?

      now of course i'm wondering why

4.1.24  9:43 pm   best chord resolution?

      F C

4.1.24  9:39 pm   Would you agree that written music is ultimately curated improv

      yes

4.1.24  9:13 pm   is there any rhyme or reason to the amount of seriousness you take to each question

      only insofar as that i explore the spectrum sufficiently over time

4.1.24  8:35 pm   Does non-music ever music?

      yes it does

4.1.24  7:19 pm   If you were to become a random fish or a tree in the world, would you rather become a fish or a tree?

      in keeping with your random theme, let's randomize it amongst both

4.1.24  6:58 pm   how often do you think?

      i'm not sure

4.1.24  5:57 pm   if you were a verb what verb would you be 

      am

4.1.24  3:37 pm   Do you think the universe likes it's beginnings being known as the "Big Bang"?

      sure, but that's only temporary. eventually we'll know more about it, and then have a much more appropriate name. like that loud bang you hear in the next room when a lamp falls over, which you are forced to refer to as simply 'that loud bang' until you find out more clearly what it actually was

4.1.24  1:40 pm   If people don't understand me, should I explain myself or would they fail to understand my explanation?

      it all just depends on how good the explanation is

4.1.24  12:38 pm   Woke up and thought about this website. Anywho, can you say a few words that will touch my soul?

      sure

4.1.24  10:43 am   what fx do you usually add to your vocals? i know you don't use autotune or anything, i mean more in terms of saturation or etc...

      just sing it twice (in real life). pan one left, pan the other right. not much else. verses or more intimate lines may be singles instead

4.1.24  9:26 am   Do you know any good pranks?

      how about world peace

4.1.24  7:30 am   Ever ate a chikmen nunmbget?

      no

4.1.24  5:47 am   is there any pro tip to perfume-making that you're aware of

      no

4.1.24  12:23 am   any particularly silly plans for the future?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes





PREVIOUS QUESTIONS

3.31.24  11:37 pm   do you have synesthesia?

      no, but that doesn't mean i don't love colors

3.31.24  11:11 pm   boo! did i scare ya?

      no

3.31.24  10:08 pm   what is your favorite brand of laundry baskets?

      mercedes benz

3.31.24  9:37 pm   what do i do when i have a problem

      solve it. i know that's not a specific answer, but, to be fair, it's exactly as specific as the question

3.31.24  8:45 pm   what do you think of sports?

      it would be more fun if you could win and lose at the same time

3.31.24  6:22 pm   can you write a song about Aldi?

      i could, but i'm unlikely to do something that someone else has suggested. so if i do it, it would have to be after i've forgotten that you've suggested it

3.31.24  3:49 pm   Is technocracy theocracy?

      let me perform some calculations

3.31.24  3:03 pm   In a dream last night the funk band onstage played a song and I thought, "what a great song, everyone knows this one." It was still in my head when I woke up, but by the time I realized that it was actually an original song I had forgotten it. Bill what the fuck do I do here??

      act quicker next time

3.31.24  2:24 pm   do you enjoy getting more serious questions?

      i enjoy the range of seriousness in the quesitons just the way it is

3.31.24  12:39 pm   be honest is the musical music true

      it can be made true, with music

3.31.24  11:37 am   Are you well versed in the art of indifference?

      i don't care

3.31.24  7:06 am   what is yo ur favorite chess opening

      g4

3.31.24  4:57 am   How do you conjure such insane amounts of joy 

      that's your fault

3.31.24  2:13 am   What is the texture of joy?

      joy is reliant on the ability to change textures

3.31.24  12:10 am   Did people ever stop asking about the lowercase letters, or did you just stop responding to them? 

      neither

3.31.24  12:03 am   out of all the languages why did you choose dutch

      gewoon, omdat het lekker is, natuurlijk

3.30.24  11:43 pm   do you have a foolproof way to inject your love for everything into your work

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

3.30.24  10:44 pm   what's a good mistake that i can make

      all of them are good, especially the bad ones

3.30.24  10:22 pm   Which single chord, out of the following list of chords, do you like the most: G7, F#m7, Ddim, C#aug, A#9b5, Cmaj7

      that's not how chords work, for 2 reasons: first of all, any of the chord symbols you mentioned could be played in a million different ways which would completely change their sound and therefore their 'likeability'. but what's more is, even then, the likeability of chords depends on what else is around them, and before and after

3.30.24  10:04 pm   why doesn't 33+77 equal 100

      because it equals 100 + 10

3.30.24  9:27 pm   What's your personal theory to cope with the existence or non-existence of good and evil? 

      'good and evil' seems boring, unrealistic, and fake. what interests me much more is: when both parties are challenged to learn why and how they find themselves so at odds with each other, with neither side being intrinsically favored as the inherent protagonist

3.30.24  8:24 pm   Do you always feel the need to create?

     mostly yes

     Thanks for the inspiration
